step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed into fists and muscles tight as you draw your arms in front of your chest.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Great job on this step. Continue to open your fingers and extend arms horizontally while exhaling and relaxing.
Good continuation. Focus on maintaining the horizontal arm extension and relaxed muscles.
Excellent first rep! You're effectively promoting lymph drainage with these movements.
Second rep starting strong. Remember to close your fingers into fists and tighten your muscles as you bring your arms in.
Good execution of opening fingers and extending arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Well done. Continue to open fingers and extend arms horizontally while exhaling and relaxing.
Good job maintaining the form. Keep your arms extended horizontally and muscles relaxed.
Fantastic finish! You completed both reps with good control, effectively performing the horizontal pumping exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers fisted and muscles tight when bringing your arms in, then open your fingers and relax as you extend them outwards. This helps promote lymph drainage effectively.
